titles.title: I am not skilled to understand

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: I am not skilled to understand What God hath willed, what God hath planned; I only know at His right hand Stands One who is my Savior.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: I take Him at His word indeed: “Christ died for sinners”—this I read; For in my heart I find a need Of Him to be my Savior!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: And was there then no other way For God to take? - I cannot say; I only bless Him, day by day, Who saved me through my Saviour.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: That He should leave His place on high And come for sinful man to die, You count it strange? So once did I Before I knew my Savior!

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: And, oh, that He fulfilled may see The travail of His soul in me, And with His work contented be, As I with my dear Savior!

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: Yes, living, dying, let me bring My strength, my solace from this spring— That He who lives to be my King Once died to be my Savior!
